programme.desc: Piri Piri; Fried Okra with Shrimp (Mozambique); Moqueca (Brazil); Braised Pork with Clams Mariner's Style (Portugal); Banana Fritters (Goa); Caipirinha (Brazil)

programme.desc: Grilling contest winner recipes: Laotian Grilled Pork Skewers with Papaya Salad and Sticky Rice; Grilled Eggplant Pockets; Ginger-Mango Flank Steak with Fennel Slaw; Mike's Mega Grilled Pizza

programme.title: Emeril Live
programme.desc: Emeril serves up tasty Easter treats with an international twist: Baklava; Frozen Strawberry Lemon-Basil Mousse; Italian Easter Pie; Russian Tea Cakes

programme.title: Emeril Live
programme.desc: Recipes from Emeril's Potluck book: Champagne Punch; Helen's Sausage-Stuffed French Bread; Emeril's Oven-Braised Osso Buco with Orzo "Risotto"; Devil's Food Cake with Vanilla Buttercream Icing

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.sub-title: What to Cook When There's Nothing in the Pantry
programme.desc: What can you cook when there's nothing in the pantry? Emeril shares recipes that require minimal ingredients: vegetable frittata, easy fettuccine with bacon and peas, and roasted garlic soup.

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Make delicious Asian dishes with Emeril's recipes: chicken and veggie stir-fry with cellophane noodles, beef and soba noodle stir-fry, and cold-noodle salad with honey-sesame dressing and peanuts

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Emeril hosts a group of "recipe rut" moms. Classic balsamic vinaigrette, grilled shrimp with creamy avocado-lime vinaigrette, and fresh tomato vinaigrette

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Any time of year is a great time for a cookout! Join Emeril for grilled rack of lamb with mixed-herb pesto and a side of grilled potatoes with feta

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Emeril prepares healthy kids' meals: baked chicken fingers with creamy dreamy dipping sauce, edamame with sesame oil, and hot and hearty minestrone soup. Both kids and parents will love these dishes!

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Emeril's brunch will feed a bunch! Cheesy country ham omelet, followed by warm popovers with creamy Creole shrimp, Prosecco and orange sorbet with Cointreau cocktail

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Emeril takes you on a trip to Spain as he shares his favorite meals: salt-crusted branzino seasoned with citrus, grilled calamari, and seafood paella

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Emeril shows you how versatile phyllo dough is as he makes both sweet and savory dishes: honey-soaked and butter-drenched baklava; tuna tartare in phyllo cups

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril as he shows New Orleans Saints player Juwan Johnson and his wife Chanen how to prepare a classic Big Easy dinner.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and Chef Shermond Esteen as they explore a menu inspired by Shermond's restaurant brunch menu. Get ready to try Eggs Florentine, Potato Cakes and Mornay Sauce, and Bread Pudding with Rum Sauce.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and his friend Justin Kennedy of Parkway Bakery and Tavern as they explore a menu filled with classic New Orleans sandwiches. Emeril will make everything from the classic Po' boy to the Muffuletta.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and his friends Lindsey Brower and Nan Wallis as they create a mouth-watering meal inspired by locally brewed sake.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and interns Asia Magee and Chassidy Carter as they take on the dishes made at Cafe Reconcile. Get ready to try Emeril's classic Crab Cakes, Fried Green Tomatoes, and Pineapple Cornbread.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and his dear friend Chef Aaron Sanchez as they explore a menu inspired by a trip to Cuba: Cuban-Style Picadillo and Sweet Potato Casserole, Arroz con Puerco, and, of course, Croquetas.

programme.title: Emeril Live
programme.desc: Gin-Marinated Olive Martini; Citrus-Cured Gravlax with Lemon-Caper Cream Cheese Spread and Chive Blinis; Vegetable-Stuffed Pork Tenderloin; Rose Brut Champagne Float with Raspberry Sorbet

programme.title: Emeril Live
programme.desc: Anchovy Garlic Dip (Bagna Cauda); Risotto with Sweet Peppers (Risotto con Pepperone); Beef Braised in Barolo (Brasato al Barolo); Chocolate Chestnut Mousse (Spuma di Cioccolato e Castagne)
